stem.text:
U6 p59 Voc10.1 the arts[html]

Complete the sentence with one of the following words abstract • blockbusters • cast • contemporary • gallery • productions.

I'm not convinced I like all classical ballet but I love _____ dance.

U6 p59 Voc10.2 the arts[html]

Complete the sentence with one of the following words abstract • blockbusters • cast • contemporary • gallery • productions.

I sometimes nip into an art _____ or exhibition during my lunch break.

U6 p59 Voc10.3 the arts[html]

Complete the sentence with one of the following words abstract • blockbusters • cast • contemporary • gallery • productions.

I prefer landscapes or portraits to more _____ paintings.

U6 p59 Voc10.4 the arts[html]

Complete the sentence with one of the following words abstract • blockbusters • cast • contemporary • gallery • productions.

I'll often go to a play more than once if there's a different _____ performing.

U6 p59 Voc10.5 the arts[html]

Complete the sentence with one of the following words abstract • blockbusters • cast • contemporary • gallery • productions.

I tend to go for original theatre _____ by controversial directors.

U6 p59 Voc10.6 the arts[html]

Complete the sentence with one of the following words abstract • blockbusters • cast • contemporary • gallery • productions.

I'm a keen film-goer but I usually avoid _____ .
